PHRASE.LANG: If you’re a CAS pilot or technician you’re going to have many accessories for your CAS armor suits. CAS Scaffolding is the only way to organize all of your gear in your personal space. The CAS Scaffolding is designed to be stack by the user to create any number of different configurations. You'll see that all of your accessories fit onto the shelving systems with ease.[#Legal]

Si vous êtes pilote ou technicien pour le CAS, vous aurez forcément beaucoup d'accessoires pour vos costumes blindés. L'échafaudage du CAS est la seule façon pour vous d'organiser votre équipement dans votre espace personnel. L'échafaudage du CAS est conçu pour être configuré de multiples façons. Tous vos accessoires rentreront facilement sur ses étagères.[#Legal]

If you’re a CAS pilot or technician you’re going to have many accessories for your CAS armor suits. CAS Scaffolding is the only way to organize all of your gear in your personal space. The CAS Scaffolding is designed to be stack by the user to create any number of different configurations. You'll see that all of your accessories fit onto the shelving systems with ease.[#Legal]
